item.title: My Favorite Tweets
item.description: Serverless I still see this a lot in the wild, so I'll reiterate: please deploy your stateless and stateful resources in separate CloudFormation stacks this will give you the flexibility to update your stateless resources (typically code) often without touching your databases and stores — Boris Tane üçã (@boristane) October 30, 2022
